information: The company AMAZONEN-WERKE H.DREYER GMBH &CO.KG, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1883, which operates in the Agricultural systems and equipment industry. It also operates in the Tractors and trailers, agricultural, Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, Livestock raising - machinery and equipment, and Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Hasbergen, Germany.
